definitions.meaning:
article(on/about sth)
a piece of writing about a particular subject in a newspaper or magazine 
（报刊上的）文章，论文，报道

examples.content:
Have you seen that article about young fashion designers? 
你见到了关于年轻时装设计师的那篇文章没有？

definitions.meaning:
( law 律 ) a separate item in an agreement or a contract 
（协议、契约的）条款，项

examples.content:
Article 10 of the European Convention guarantees free speech.
 《欧洲公约》第 10 条保障言论自由。

definitions.meaning:
( formal) a particular item or separate thing, especially one of a set 
物件，物品（尤指整套中的一件）  (item)

examples.content:
toilet articles such as soap and shampoo 
诸如肥皂和洗发剂之类的梳妆用品

The articles found in the car helped the police to identify the body. 
在汽车上发现的物品有助于警方辨认死者身分。

definitions.meaning: ( grammar 语法 ) the words a and an( the indefinite article) or the( the definite article) 冠词（a 和 an 为不定冠词，the 为定冠词）
